meanings.definition: Mixed with a metal to make an alloy.
meanings.sent1: The copper was alloyed with zinc to create a stronger material.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, they alloyed different metals to study their properties.
meanings.sent3: The scientist alloyed the elements together, creating a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: Her determination alloyed with her talent to form an unbeatable combination.
meanings.sent5: The chef alloyed the flavors perfectly, creating a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: Combined or blended with something else.
meanings.sent1: The alloyed metal had unique properties that made it ideal for construction.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace made of alloyed metals that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The alloyed colors of the painting created a mesmerizing effect on the viewers.
meanings.sent4: His alloyed skills in art and music made him a versatile performer.
meanings.sent5: The alloyed flavors of the dish surprised and delighted the diners.
